description: The main character is a 15-year-old boy with blonde hair and green eyes from the prestigious Vessalius family of which his father is the head. The story of Pandora Hearts starts when Oz turns 15 years old. During the ceremony to celebrate this reaching of adulthood, he is dragged into the Abyss for the crime of `existing`. There he meets the chain Alice and makes a contract with her. Upon returning to the real world, he finds out that 10 years have passed. In order to find out what his sin meant, he now works under Break as part of Pandora.
name: Oz Vessalius
